Judul: EVALUATING STRATEGIC SHOPPER BASED STORE ENVIRONMENT TO CREATE EXCELLENT SHOPPING EXPERIENCE
Abstrak: In the fashion industry various apparel line are trying their best in creating the more attractive, more trendy, and higher quality apparel in affordable price. However, the real question is even after they create such products is it a guarantee that people will actually buy them?
Kata Kunci: Store Environment, Store Design, Store Ambience, Store Social Element, Shopping Experience, Shopper Acceptance
